title: SKL Home Gnome Holiday (Skl) Hand Towel (2-Pack), Dove Gray
features: 2pc terry towel sets gives 2 different looks
One solid towel with gnome embroidery
One jacquard towel with a red and white plaid pattern
description: Add fun and whimsy to your holiday decor with the Gnome Holiday 2-piece hand towel set. Made of soft, cotton terry, one towel features cute gnome embroidery, and the other is a jacquard towel with a red and white plaid pattern. Use them together or separately for 2 different looks. SKL Home by Saturday Knight Ltd. brings personality, fun, and flair to the most intimate spaces in your home with products ranging from bath accessories and shower curtains to towels, curtains, and beyond. Whether your style is upbeat and modern or classic and cozy, SKL Home provides a look to complement almost any décor. Combining 40+ years’ experience, global design inspiration, and premium fabrications, SKL Home continues to lead the way in home accessories.
